revised_title: On the Structure and Development of Bone: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This study examines the structure and development of bone, focusing on Haversian systems, laminar structure, and ossified articular cartilage. The authors also describe the process of bone tissue formation and the role of lacunal cells in bone development. Their findings provide a deeper understanding of bone growth and its implications for human health.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Physiology
